goals.title: Development
goals.subtitle: Frontend. Backend. Databases. Servers.
points: Develop and maintainance web applications using the best technologies and other related.
Collaboration with cross-functional teams, including designers, business analysts, project managers, product managers, and other developers to create high-quality software.
We are based on the best practices of agile methodologies and the unified development process.
Creation of custom applications for different platforms, such as mobile, desktop or web.

goals.title: Marketing
goals.subtitle: Management of social networks. Advertising. Emails.
points: Creation and promotion of online content to drive traffic to a website.
Advice to improve the visibility of a company online and recommendations to know how to make the most of digital marketing opportunities.
Manage social media accounts establishing marketing strategies to promote a company through social platforms.
Create and send email campaigns to a subscriber list to promote products or services.

goals.title: Graphic Design
goals.subtitle: UX/UI designs. Brands. Logos. Packaging. Flyers.
points: Produce a unique and recognizable visual image that represents a company or brand.
Include the creation of printed materials such as brochures, flyers, banners, packaging, letterheads and posters.
Creation of attractive and user-friendly visual designs for pages, websites, applications.
Poster design to promote products or services on social media platforms.

goals.title: IT Service
goals.subtitle: Support. Software. Hardware. Security
points: Installation and configuration of computer systems, as well as their maintenance and updating.
Remote or face-to-face technical assistance services to solve technical problems or provide support to users.
Virus and malware protection services. In addition, security solutions to protect information and computer systems of a company.
Information technology consulting, advice on technological decision-making and IT project management.
Sale of computer supplies with a wide variety of brands and products (PCs, notebooks, printers, headphones, monitors, among others).
